title: BBC Local Live: Leicestershire on Wednesday 4 January 2017 - BBC News
summary: tuilagi out for the rest of the season .
'smashed up ' school to reopen next week .
man died 'trying to save ' slurry-fall teen .
next warns on 2017 outlook as sales fall .

documents.title: our live coverage across the day
text: our live updates have now ended and will return tomorrow from 08:00 .

documents.title: weather : cold and frosty night ahead
text: dry and clear this evening and overnight which will allow a widespread frost to form as temperatures fall below freezing .
down to -2c ( 28f ) in urban areas and as low as -6c ( 21f ) in the countryside .
author: Kay Crewdson
BBC weather presenter

documents.title: latest headlines for leicestershire
text: here 's what 's happening across leicestershire :
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: fatal house fire in rutland
text: a person has died following a house fire in cottesmore , rutland .
the blaze , in the early hours of this morning , was attended by four fire crews .
the crews managed to rescue the person trapped inside but they died later in hospital .
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: referee chosen for fa cup tie
text: martin atkinson has been chosen to referee leicester 's fa cup game at everton this weekend .
he last took charge of city in their 0-0 draw with southampton in october .
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: baby death manslaughter trial begins
text: a 31-year-old woman accused of manslaughter shook a seven-month-old baby `` repeatedly , vigorously and aggressively '' , a court has heard .
chuanfang zheng ( was looking after phoebe guo in march 2015 at a property in lutterworth , leicestershire .
phoebe suffered a `` catastrophic and ultimately fatal injury '' caused by `` excessive force '' , the jury at leicester crown court heard .
ms zheng , of mortlock close , southwark , london , denies the charge .
author: Sonia Kataria
BBC News Online

documents.title: listen : reaction to richard cockerill 's sacking
text: here 's what tom youngs , ed slater and aaron mauger have had to say :
author: BBC Leicester Sport

documents.title: students capture earth via balloon camera
text: and here is another of their for you to enjoy
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: leicester students ' 'out of this world '
text: students from the university of leicester have taken these stunning of the earth 's stratosphere .
they took the using a high altitude weather balloon .
probably much more sophisticated than one of those free ones restaurants give out to kids
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: 'smashed up ' school to reopen on monday
text: braunstone primary school will not now reopen until next week after it was trashed by vandals .
dozens of windows and roof panels were smashed .
police said two 11-year-old boys have been arrested and bailed in connection with the incident .
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: pietersen 'praying for a speedy recovery ' for manu
text: leicester tigers winger jp pietersen tweets
pietersen is also out injured at the moment .
chief my man , praying for a speedy recovery .
i know you will come back stronger .
p.s i know an african doctor that can fix you quick quick
thanks my brother .
when are going to africa then ?
@ twitterid witch dr are you talking about lol
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: additional help for mauger
text: it has been a been busy old day down at leicester tigers .
brett deacon comes in to help with defence and the forwards and boris stankovich is now part-time scrum coach .
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: jobs at holiday firm saved by buyout
text: about 200 jobs that were going to be lost as part of the collapse of all leisure holidays have been saved , according to the company 's administrator .
part of the company has been sold to the canadian tour operator g adventures inc .
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: your photos : january across rutland
text: thanks for bbc weather watcher andy 's rutland for this pic of some sparrows in empingham .
author: BBC Weather Watchers

documents.title: england 's tuilagi out for rest of season
text: england 's tuilagi out for rest of season

documents.title: youngs : no 'coup ' against cockerill
text: tigers club captain tom youngs has rejected claims that a player revolt led to the sacking of richard cockerill as the club 's director of rugby on monday .
one newspaper suggested that cockerill had been ousted after what amounted to a player coup .
youngs has told bbc radio leicester they have a `` united squad '' at the club and the speculation is `` a load of rubbish '' .
author: Mike McCarthy
BBC Radio Leicester sport at Oval Park

documents.title: latest headlines for leicestershire
text: here 's what 's happening across our region :
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: trouble for market harborough-based holiday firm
text: here is the sign outside all leisure group 's hq in market harborough .
read more about the company stopping trading here .
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: tuilagi to miss six nations and lions tour
text: this cruciate ligament damage is the latest in a long line of injuries for tuilagi .
he has made just 23 appearances for tigers since the start of the 2013-14 season because of a string of injuries .
this latest setback also means he 'll miss the six nations and is unavailable for the british and irish lions tour to new zealand .
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: 'full refunds ' for holidaymakers hit by tour operator 's troubles
text: the caa has sought to reassure travellers that they will be able to reclaim any money `` as quickly as possible . ''
andy cohen , head of atol at the caa , said : `` we understand this will be concerning news for anyone who has booked to travel with the company .
`` however , the atol scheme exists for exactly this kind of situation and we are making immediate arrangements so all atol-protected customers can claim full refunds as quickly as possible . ''
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: breakingholiday firm stops trading
text: market harborough-based holiday company all leisure group has stopped trading , leaving hundreds of holidaymakers stranded at their destinations .
the civil aviation authority ( caa ) will help to repatriate the 400 people who are currently abroad , but 7,000 future bookings have been cancelled .
all holidaymakers will receive refunds .
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: breakingtuilagi out for the season
text: manu tuilagi out for the season through injury , aaron mauger confirms .
author: Mike McCarthy
BBC Radio Leicester sport at Oval Park

documents.title: mauger to face the media
text: amid the large , assorted media group , the ( hot ) seat awaits for aaron mauger ahead of his first news conference in charge of leicester tigers .
author: Mike McCarthy
BBC Radio Leicester sport at Oval Park

documents.title: leicester-based retailer 'underperforming '
text: next chairman lord wolfson said the figures were disappointing .
`` the simple problem is that next is underperforming the market , '' he said .
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: next warns on outlook as sales fall
text: shares in leicester-based retailer next have fallen by 9 % after it warned 2017 would be a `` challenging '' year .
pre-christmas sales at next fell by 0.4 % .
the retailer added sales in 2017 could be hit as rising inflation erodes earnings growth and squeezes consumer spending .
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: listen : ndidi 'will be the successor for n'golo kante '
text: belgian football journalist tom boudeweel has said wilfred ndidi looks like he 'll have a bright future at leicester city
author: BBC Leicester Sport

documents.title: tuilagi injury is 'bad news ' for tigers
text: here is the link to read chris foy 's story about what he believes is a season-ending injury for manu tuilagi .
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: tuilagi 'out for the season '
text: daily mail rugby union correspondent tweets
sadly , i 'm hearing tuilagi is out for the season with serious knee injury .
leicester update due shortly .
full story on @ twitterid now
how sad .
he has been very unlucky and with such huge potential .
his leg muscles are too powerful for his joints ?
@ twitterid @ twitterid it 's obviously awful for him but we are getting all to used to seeing him for only a few games per season
very sad .
chris you may want to amend the headline on @ twitterid however , as i 'm pretty sure sarries won
looked a bad un from the off alas .
and look of despair on his own in the dug out out afterwards told its own story
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: today 's back page
text: it is time for other members of leicester city 's squad to step up to the plate with three key players now away at the africa cup of nations , christian fuchs believes .
author: Leicester Mercury

documents.title: today 's front page
text: hundreds of pupils will miss the first day of term after vandals broke into their school and caused thousands of pounds worth of damage .
author: Leicester Mercury

documents.title: jones open to cockerill england role
text: jones open to cockerill england role

documents.title: no post-mortem results for slurry death pair , inquest hears
text: det sgt burton added that they were still awaiting full results from the post-mortem examinations on both men .
the health and safety executive previously said the accident involved slurry .
author: Ben Truslove
BBC News Online

documents.title: pair cut out from slurry tank , inquest hears
text: det sgt anna burton , from leicestershire police , told rutland and north leicestershire coroner 's court , that mr walker was asked to clean out the tanker .
after mr walker fell in , mr rawson came to his aid but he too fell in .
both bodies were recovered after a hole was cut in the side of the vehicle .
author: Ben Truslove
BBC News Online

documents.title: latest headlines for leicestershire
text: here 's what 's happening across our region :
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: vote : were tigers right to sack richard cockerill ?
text: we love a bit of interactivity on local live - so why not have a go at this twitter poll ?
it 's neck and neck so far , so your vote could be crucial
were leicester tigers right to sack director of rugby richard cockerill ?
that 's a pretty conclusively inconclusive poll
as conclusive as brexit .
yes- and that 's a mess too
yes , sadly , there has been little to no improvement over the past 3 seasons overall despite 2 poor semi finals last year .
sadly yes , we were not improving and making the same mistakes
@ twitterid it was just time for a different approach , great club man .
we are better than result have shown .
@ twitterid no
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: man died trying to save slurry-fall teen
text: two men died in a slurry tanker on a leicestershire farm after one fell in while trying to rescue the other , an inquest has heard .
gavin rawson , 35 , was trying to save nathan walker , 19 , after he fell in the tanker at church farm , normanton , while attempting to clear a blockage .
the inquests were opened and adjourned until march .
author: Ben Truslove
BBC News Online

documents.title: springbok world cup winner a 'good fit ' for tigers
text: johnson did however warm a bit more towards the idea of current montpellier boss and south africa 's 2007 world cup winning coach , jake white , taking charge of tigers .
he said : `` they 're talking about jake white who would probably be a good shoo-in .
`` but , having said that , he would want to bring i 'm sure his own coaching team which would mean you 'd lose the likes of aaron mauger . ''
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: ex-england coach 's leicester chances slammed
text: i do n't want you to hold back , steve
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: johnson : 'joke ' lancaster should n't get tigers job
text: former leicester tigers captain steve johnson has rubbished any suggestions stuart lancaster may replace richard cockerill at welford road .
`` that has got to be a joke , '' johnson told bbc radio leicester .
`` i think we would be back down to the crowd numbers i played in front of of about 3,000 .
people would not accept that - i do n't rate him as a coach and i do n't think he should have been the england coach . ''
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: watch : east midlands today weather forecast
text: will you need to wear two pairs of socks today for your walk into work ?
sara blizzard has the details
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: car attacks 'may be linked , ' police say
text: police have said they are considering some of the 67 incidents of car vandalism in leicestershire over the new year period could be linked .
dozens of villagers in the wreake valley , along the a607 , woke up on bank holiday monday to vehicles with broken windows and slashed tyres .
author: BBC Radio Leicester

documents.title: good morning : welcome to today 's live updates
text: good morning and welcome along to the fourth day of 2017 .
i 'll be with you until later with the region 's news , sport , weather and travel .
if you would like to share any and stories then please get in touch via facebook , twitter or email .
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live
